name: Easy to Manage Vendor
author: Naeem khan

sections.description:
Have you had trouble managing your multi-seller site?
Great news for you. Install this plugin. You can easily chat with the seller and the seller can also easily chat with you through WhatsApp.
Easy to Manage Vendor is a WhatsApp chatting system plugin developed primarily for admin and seller communication. The main purpose of this plugin is to make it easier for multi-vendor site administrators to manage their site seller. Now we send emails if we want to send a notice to any vendor. If we use this plugin then we can send notices to WhatsApp.

Benefit of plugin:

  1. Admin can send multiple sms at a time.
  2. This plugin allows vendors to easily communicate with the admin from their dashboard site which was very difficult before.
  3. The plugin is much lighter.
  4. Existing multi-vendor sites and be able to use.

Plugin limitations

  1. This plugin can only be used by Dokan and WCFM Marketplace Lover.

How are we sending sms on whatsapp

ðŸ“² Easy to Manage Vendor plugin is basically sending sms to WhatsApp in 2 ways.
1. Using API.
2. Without API.
We are using two APIs for sending SMS to WhatsApp
1 Twilio API.
2. Ultramag API.

ðŸ¤© Easy to Manage Vendor Features:

  1. ðŸ“± International Phone number Validation: Manage Seller from all over the world. Vendors from different countries can register with their country code. They can easily find their country of residence by choosing their flag or entering the country code and phone number. All they need is the WhatsApp connection on their device.
  2. ðŸ“œ Default country selection: Choose a preferred default country from the plugin setting and it will set the corresponding country code by default on the seller dashboard page.
  3. ðŸ“ƒ All Seller WhatsApp Number List: There will be a list of all seller store names and WhatsApp numbers. From where admin can select one or multiple seller and chat on WhatsApp.
  4. ðŸ“œ Available Shortcodes: Manage your seller with available shortcodes.
  5. ðŸ’¬ Seller Chat On/Off Option: The system admin will be able to disconnect the vendor and turn on the vendor connection.
  6. Hide WhatsApp number input field in register form: By default vendor register form has a WhatsApp number input field. Admin can turn off it.
  7. Stop forcibly taking seller WhatsApp numbers: This is the best feature of the plugin. This will be used to get WhatsApp number from existing vendor site sellers. This feature is on by default and can be turned off by system admin.If this feature is turned on and if a user does not provide their WhatsApp number, their site will not work unless they provide the WhatsApp number.
  8. ðŸ’¥ Custom CSS: Make your store design with your style. Customize almost everything with the custom CSS feature of Easy to manage vendor. Easily customize your siteâ€™s appearance by this feature easily.
